desc: Cell phone signal boosters by South Africa's leading signal booster company - Bolton Technical. Say Goodbye to dropped calls, missed texts and slow data! Boost your signal in your home, office or vehicle. Signal boosters for Vodacom, MTN, Telkom and Cell C. ICASA Approved. Free Shipping over R500.
